document.full_text: amazon.com could cut its partnership with affiliates in more u.s. states that require the online retailer to collect sales tax, chief executive jeff bezos said on wednesday.
document.title: amazon could cut ties in more states over tax dispute
lines_and_colors: amazon.com could cut its partnership with affiliates in more u.s. states that require the online retailer to collect sales tax, chief executive jeff bezos said on wednesday.
